website_summaries.verdict: Combines beauty, versatility, and affordability. Will look great in both traditional and modern homes.
pros: An interesting design that comes in a variety of finish options
Owners rave about its beautiful looks and affordable price
cons: Assembly is tedious, and the instructions could be better

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I hung this chandelier in place of a ceiling fan in my living room. I had seen lights similar to this one in big name stores but they were never quite right or too expensive. The size is perfect and the chrome finish looks very classy. It gave my living room the glam touch it needed without over spending. It was pretty simple to put together and install. Absolutely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: 6spdTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! if it comes with the right instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous chandelier! But it’s ridiculous that the fixture didn’t come with the correct instructions. So we took way longer putting it together because we had to figure it out on our own. Tip: notice the tiny knobs sticking out in the middle of the loop pieces, and using the completed photo as a guide, find the holes in the other loop pieces where they go in. Loosen the minuscule screws (8) inside the loop connector pieces (2), then firmly insert each piece of the loop, and tighten screws with little tool included—see photo. When I emailed the company, they did eventually send the correct instructions. I have included them here for your convenience. Welcome. :)
customer_reviews.author: mcw

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. Wish I could give it 4.5 rating. The size is great for a larger room and because the metal is thin it does not look too heavy. It also throws off a lot of light with the 5 bulbs and the shadows it throws on the ceiling look cool too. The quality is not top of the line but it looks great. Only complaint is the instructions were worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Zkeller

customer_reviews.title: For both dining room and kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great looking chandelier. Pain to put together but once together it's great. Don't use 60 watt bulbs. Way too bright
customer_reviews.author: Tarry Bates

customer_reviews.title: beautiful fixture! the assembly directions provided in the follow ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful fixture! the assembly directions provided in the follow up email were very easy to understand and the assembly didn't take long. the light was a little difficult to hang from our high ceilings with just 1 person but it's doable. overall very satisfied with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great light to update an 80's house!
customer_reviews.text: The light is beautiful and looks exactly as in the picture. It came packed well and was a relatively easy install. It was the perfect replacement for an old 80's brass fixture!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fixture
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this fixture. It's lovely, large, and lasting. I did lots of research before making a decision on my office fixture. I wanted something that was big but with a slim profile. This fit the profile and it was beautiful when it arrived. I decided against keeping it the ORB color as it left little to the imagination. I decided to paint it copper to contrast with my furniture. Talk about breathtaking. the pictures don't do it justice. I also added Hue bulbs to give more creative control to the lights. Such a good decision to purchase. My contractor came to put it and it took all of 25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two lights for our 20 ft entrance way ceilings. The first one went together easily. The second one had issues because we couldn’t get the small pins to align into the holes. We tried bending the pieces but it did t help. We had already pre-scheduled an electrician to come out the following morning to install the lights, so they got hung anyway. You can even tell that one of the lights doesn’t fit together tightly when they are so high, so we love them both. We are slowly updating our 15-year-old traditional home with a more modern style and these were a perfect addition.
customer_reviews.author: txmom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, better than photos
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of these lights and they were fairly easy to assemble. One was missing a few pieces but customer service was quick to help me figure out which pieces I needed and got them shipped out to me for free very quickly. Pictures do not do these lights justice and you cannot beat the price. I have contractors who install this style of lights and were stunned when they found out how much we paid for ours. Truly are gorgeous and catches your eyes as you walk into our home and dining area.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this ceiling fixture! It is the perfect size for our small-ish dining room in our little coastal cottage. The perfect mix of old and new, farmhouse and fun. The only issue was that the directions did not include what type/size/wattage of bulb was required and I had to search through customer comments to find out what to put on my shopping list. We purchased chandelier style light bulbs, so they are slimmer at the base and choose frosted white so it wouldn't be so "glare-y". 60 watt was too bright, we are using 40 watt. Shipping was fast and the fixture came undamaged. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L Grauer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great quality, "some assembly required".
customer_reviews.text: This was a returned item, so the price was excellent. The light is very attractive with a modern design. The materials and method of construction are outstanding. It's a little complicated to assemble with very tiny screws. I dropped one and had to use a big magnet to find it (couldn't see it). The manufacturer thoughtfully included some extra screws and a small metric allen wrench in the package. The assembly instructions were great. Overall, we are very please with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RML

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort, beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Love the light now that’s it up! Exactly what I wanted but......not an easy assembly at all. Tiny tiny screws hold in the bars and it would be helpful for you to place a white towel or whatever under it should one fly off! Also getting the chain apart took quite a bit of muscle to open an end to hook to ceiling and lamp. The instructions were not the best either. I will say I was missing some screws and they promptly sent me more than enough. Definitely worth it but a two person job.
customer_reviews.author: BHAebly

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this seller - one of the lights exploded in flames due to faulty wiring.
customer_reviews.text: We adore this light fixture, it is beautiful and goes perfectly with our modern decor. Unfortunately, we've now purchased the light three times and two of those times we received a damaged product. We noticed that our LED bulbs were burning out when we first realized something with this light was wrong. Then one night, 10 seconds after turning the light on it exploded in flames at the tip of one of the candlesticks; the bulb completely melted. Since we love this light so much, we anticipated that this was a one-off and purchased the light once more. This time, the light came to us clearly used. Several of the screw holes are stripped. Beware of this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Linn

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten so many compliments on this globe! I was a little nervous it would be too small, but it’s actually quite large. It is the perfect fit for our enterance way. Our house is three stories & this globe hands from the third story and dangles nicely. The chain is long (which I love). If you are debating on this, just get it!
customer_reviews.author: 30 Year Old Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: very big and pretty but not light in feeling/weight
customer_reviews.text: Tough assembly as others mentioned, so no need to repeat all that here. It is very shiny and pretty and big, however, it is too light and airy. The rings are too skinny. When you turn it on (i used frosted bulbs - both 40w and 60w mixed) you can hardly see the fixture itself because the bare bulbs are kind of blinding (the kind of light that stays imprinted in your retina). I need a fixture with more oomph, weight, and presence. This one you can hardly see hanging there. Look at the other pics of it and you'll see what I mean. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: NEF

customer_reviews.title: Modern, Trendy, and Fun Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to update our entry way chandelier with something modern, but different. We were leaning towards the sputnik design, but found this Sphere or Orb design instead. It is very classy, bright and decorative. We bought a dimmer thinking the lights would be too bright, but the light is just right and not overly bright at all. We found some pointy candelabra LED lights that have the squiggle wire inside that made the whole thing even more fun! Now we have to add more decorating to go with the chandelier!!! Highly recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It should be noted that you get what you pay for! This light is cheap, of course it’s not going to be great quality (lesson learned) 🤷🏻‍♀️ The light itself is industrial/modern and looks pretty in a room from afar. When you get close you can see imperfections in the welding and one of the pieces doesn’t correctly align. If I had a choice I wouldn’t purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful light fixture, and totally transformed the look of my vaulted-ceiling family room, replacing a ceiling fan. Wish I had done this years ago. The product quality was excellent and my order arrived in only a couple days. Much better buy than any others I've seen. It was a bit of a challenge for me to put together alone but when my adult son stepped in to help, it went very smoothly. Assembly works best with 2 people. You won't be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but tricky assembly
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is absolutely what I was looking for. It is industrial and beautiful. It was a little tricky to put together as the directions were not real clear and the pictures were useless. I had to look at the pictures on Amazon to figure it out. The light is bright and leaves stunning patterns on the walls and ceilings at night.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Horton

customer_reviews.title: but I am incredibly disappointed. It's very cheap and bound to test your ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a crazy amount of assembly required with awful instructions. You have to force so many pieces that the end product is scratched and bent. We couldn't even get one piece in properly no matter how much we tried. From a distance, it's OK, but I am incredibly disappointed. It's very cheap and bound to test your limits of frustration. Move on and spend a little more on something else.
customer_reviews.author: LI

customer_reviews.title: No chain perfect light.
customer_reviews.text: I put This light in the entryway of our home. We have a 20 foot ceiling there. The old light had a lot of glass. So it would get dusty and it was very difficult to clean. Hard to reach. This new light will be very easy to clean. Just a swiffer. Also the chain doesn’t really work with the lamp. So I replaced it with 3/16” cable. Everyone who has seen it say the cable looks much better than the chain. It went from 50/50 modern/ mid evil to full on modern.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not even close to assembled when delivered
customer_reviews.text: Is this made by IKEA?......I only ask because it came in 28 pieces.......it is a nice light for the money, but I didnt expect it to come completely in small parts ALL individually wrapped tightly in plastic........not that hard to put together but did take about 35 minutes. Overall it may have been worth it.......
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for our baby's nursery and it's absolutely perfect. We bought it used and everything came in ...
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is stunning! We bought this for our baby's nursery and it's absolutely perfect. We bought it used and everything came in fine. Gives off plenty of light for the small room. Only reason we take off a star is because there weren't enough directions it was mostly figuring out how to put it together on your own. But if you are willing to look past that difficulty it is a great light for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cox

customer_reviews.title: a pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: it looks really nice by the entrance of my place BUT was suchhhhh a pain to put together, instructions were confusing and not very good. it took us a while and it didnt look completely straight when we were done but we were so tired at that point we gave it. We get compliments on it tho
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Looks absolutely beautiful in my dining room
customer_reviews.text: Looks absolutely beautiful in my dining room. It took us a little while to put it together and install because the instructions were confusing but we were able to figure it out. Nothing youtube couldn't help with. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect, especially for the price! I can't believe I found something so nice in this price range - It looks much more expensive. All the pieces it came in made assembly seem daunting, but it was actually really easy once you got the hang of it. We hung it up ourselves without an electrician- the fact that it's relatively light helped with that. I would say it's more on the brownish side of oil-rubbed bronze than some other finishes (as opposed to black), but once hung you can barely tell what the exact color is.
customer_reviews.author: KNF

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2, satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces have to fit together, and the radii are not all correct for the pins to stay in, had to tweak them to fit correctly, and stay in place. Sounds easy but when you adjust one it affects the others, maybe super glue but that might leave marks. The light are stylish and look great but plan on a couple of hour assembly. I am happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: a book reader

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: This arrives in a relatively thin box. It requires assembly. It wasn't hard to assemble, but it takes some fussing. It was straightforward to install once assembled. It does look nice once installed.
customer_reviews.author: TruRevu

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in used damaged shape, returned it
customer_reviews.text: Electrician installed, box was missing parts, some of the parts were bent out, had to be straightened It turned out looking ok, but I’m out install and purchase price for an item that appeared to have been returned to Amazon, then sold to me in used condition at new full price
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: World class customer services did not save this product from 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: What a story these light fixtures were. Even with world class customer service and resistance free support. These fixtures fell short of my quality expectation. The quality of the materials were excellent and the fixture as a whole was nice but it had some slight issues with Di mentioning when during assembly it never went together right
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bowyer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this light
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this light! It is exactly what I was looking for, and at a great price. I hung this light over my dinning room table and I think it looks great! I would definitely recommend this product! For reference....I have 9' ceilings and my table is 78" by 40".
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive focal point!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I did big review reading before buying almost All our new rental house lighting on line!... there were some reviews about how difficult this was to put together so thought my electrician would hate me so my husband and myself put it together..took 45 minutes maybe. Using on a porch and LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Teagle

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Time an issue.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this smaller version to but in the entry way, to match with our kitchen table light. Unlike the 1st one we had by another company, this one was was delivered all in pieces and too over 2 hours to get assembled and hung. The 1st one we had, was 90% assembled. Just letting others know. The hanging finished product is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous orb chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This orb chandelier is stunning! It goes perfect in our foyer and is just the center piece that I was looking for. The ceiling height is approximately 23ft and the drop off the chain length is about 6ft. I highly highly highly recommend this chandelier if you are in the market for new lighting in your front entry way. This is a fraction of the cost from similar pieces at Wayfair and RH. Get it you won’t be disappointed. Assembly- 1 can do it alone but 2 will make the hassle of assembling it go by fast and smoother. It is overwhelming at first but stick with it because it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Looks CHEAP!!
customer_reviews.text: This product came with missing parts and brought very cheap I was in search for a chandelier for a while! I was really excited about this but when it came it was missing parts and absolutely did not meet my expectations !
customer_reviews.author: HuskerFan39

customer_reviews.title: Size works for two story foyer.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new chandelier big enough for out two story foyer, and found this one: 24 inches. And the price was very good. It was delivered quickly and the assembly was easy to follow. I wish it had more candles to hold (7 or 8), but once it was put up, it looked good. In addition, the seller sent out emails for some valuable informtion on the bulbs to be used although it is written in the manual. I was able to pay extra attention, so I did not make a mistake buying wrong bulbs. A great customer service! Overall I am happy with the purchase. I am also support small busineeses.
customer_reviews.author: K0011

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light.
customer_reviews.text: This hanging light fixture looks beautiful. It provides much more light than our old fixture. It was relatively simple to put together. I have two other old fixtures I am thinking of replacing with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra2002

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and hazardous
customer_reviews.text: Be aware, after a few months the chandelier is not working. My electrician told me it’s pice of crap, cheap made and even dangerous. We could see fired places in the spot where you instal bulbs. I will contact BBB and other agencies to check this product because it’s dangerous-it can catch fire.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Sikora

customer_reviews.title: Love it but hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love this light - looks beautiful and exactly as advertised! Only reason i gave less than 5 stars was because this was hard to put together! Took 2 men over an hour to get the rings to lineup and even still they arent locked together how they are supposed to be. You cant really tell unless u really stare at it tho, so we are happy. Matched out aesthetic perfectly! Recommend installation by professional electrician.
customer_reviews.author: WellDressedCookie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The item was broken upon delivery. It is flimsy and cheap. The quality is absolute garbage. We tried to repair/assemble the item and ended up just boxing and returning it. I would never recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: PEK

customer_reviews.title: It was a long race, but we finsished it.
customer_reviews.text: The finished product is BEAUTIFUL! But it took some work to get there. The instructions on the assembly are very confusing and hard to understand. We had to take our time and line the rods to fit the round part. Also, do not use daylight light bulbs...go with soft white, they will still be very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Ande Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard to assemble if you watch the video. Otherwise stylish and well built.
customer_reviews.author: SciBob

customer_reviews.title: Just lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this light! A bit tricky to put together and part of the instructions were missing which made me drop a star, but it's seriously great!
customer_reviews.author: EdnCity

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t have all the hardware
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with all of the hardware and only had 2 of the 5 Chrome socket covers. The light fixture itself is as pictured and I like how it looks but I’m annoyed I had to go to the hardware store just to put it together. I’m still not sure what I’ll do about the socket covers, hopefully it will look ok without them. If it came with everything it would be a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Swane

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! Very large!
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS! It's very large and is a real statement peice! Elegant and stylish! I watched a video on assembly and it was a breeze, but may be hard to assemble just using the directions. If your looking for a very large light without the very large pricetag this is perfect:)
customer_reviews.author: cassandra cuddy

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, but a huge pain and a half to assemble. I almost gave up on it. Ended up beating the metal spokes into the holes they were supposed to go in, because they kept snapping outward, making it impossible to make the screws keep the spokes in place. Instructions were not very descriptive. If I hadn’t succeeded eventually, largely with a friend’s help, I’d be giving this product a one star rating.
customer_reviews.author: zzz22

customer_reviews.title: Great fixture!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome in my two story stairway!!! It makes a big impression while also being small profile with the slim lines of the design. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Riley464

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light fixture! We didnt receive instructions with it, I believe it was missing but it wasn't hard to figure it out and also someone posted the instructions on here as well. Well designed and love the new look to our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walker

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a ceiling fan to update a house for resale. Everyone who see's it loves it! Typically I would have installed it myself but the electrician was coming to hook-up a cook top so I left it to the pro. I was doing some plumbing instead when he came. My only recommendation is having someone when you install it. The allen wrench is small, if your on a ladder and happen to drop it while installing the light having someone to hand it back to you saves a lot of time!
customer_reviews.author: Laverne

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten lots of compliments on this light fixture. I was worried it wouldn’t be bright enough but was pleasantly surprised. The overall size is a little smaller than I had hoped for but it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, beautiful pendant. Looks wonderful over my bar. It was pretty simple to put together and hang. The fixture is a little bit of a puzzle but it was no problem to figure it out. My husband did it quickly. The bronze finish is nice, looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous value
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous light. I did not buy a brand new one and it was missing directions. Other than that I just love it! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: lealysky

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the price! This chandelier looks absolutely amazing in my diningroom. Can't beat the price and it's great quality. Super satisfied. Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like the finished product and the fact that there were extra screws . However not every one of the prices for all the way in to be able to secure the price with the screw. I got them to stay however one end is in and the other is not on four prices. No matter which order I did it or how many times I tried . It’s pretty when together but that was frustrating .
customer_reviews.author: dawn m beck

customer_reviews.title: Great Chandelier-
customer_reviews.text: We recently received the Orbits II. It was well packaged and not damaged. The chandelier is sturdy, fashionable and simple to install. The assembly instructions could be more detailed, describing the individual parts more precisely. Especially differentiating the base ring from the outer and inner ring was not that easy. Some creative thinking was required :-). Overall a great product for a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is NOT handy at all but he was able to put this together. I watched our contractor install it and he made it look simple. Beautiful design. We are so happy with this timeless piece. It's very bright without being overpowering
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Hogentogler

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pieces
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to assemble. Each rod needs to be put into place and line up holes with little rods on other rods. A few times after it was put together one of the rods kept falling out 🤨. Once I got the light up it was fine. I like the look of it. Just a bit over whelming when putting together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: VERY satisfied with this purchase. High quality product! It’s a little smaller then I thought it would be but is really a very nice light.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful up, but it was difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful up, but it was difficult to put together. All those rings came as 1/2 arcs and got positioned into two wheels. It took two of us over an hour to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a great value
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! It makes the dining room light up with a modern chrome look in a traditional setting. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Geena Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: In all fairness, I never messaged the seller about this. Just installed it without the parts and rigged it up with some coat hangers and black electrical tape. Looks okay. Lights work fine for what that's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Need help! Have a red wire... ...
customer_reviews.text: Need help! Have a red wire ... instructions do not include red wire and now the light switch doesn’t work. Assembly was more challenging than it should have been. The box was big enough they could have assembled it and sent in square shape box rather than large rectangle box.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Conversation Starter!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my family room a few months ago. It's been quite the conversation starter. Good fixture for the price. Assembly was a breeze, as I completed it myself in under 45 mins. Will need another person to assist with install, which was also straightforward. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier. It's such a center piece. Looks great and get lots of compliments. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ena

customer_reviews.title: Made for high ceilings
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful chandelier and was very well packed. I had very little problems putting it together even though the instructions were very weak. There are two different pieces which build the rings. Pay attention to the holes which line up to secure the structure.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We just did a makeover on our guest bathroom and this chandelier was the perfect finishing touch. Makes a huge statement in a subtle manner. People love it!!
customer_reviews.author: CORRIE

customer_reviews.title: Get this light!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! It's large but thin materials, so it fits the room without looking bulky. It was a pain in the butt to put together since it's all individual pieces, but worth it! I'm debating buying the smaller version for the entry way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks beautiful hanging up! Highly recommend! Same light at other online stores are a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used in a rental for a hall light. Looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: SMiller

customer_reviews.title: Non working with code wiring with ark breakers that are code.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 large lights and 2 smaller lights, why are they tripping breakers? We replaced with other lights and they don’t trip breakers. Help needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Build ahead
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product but assembly took contractors hanging lights too long to put together. Suggest purchaser build lamp ahead so installation is quick. Looks awesome hanging and other drum lamps from this group are gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: lisabitar

customer_reviews.title: Looks great overall
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t perfectly all fit together. About a year later I am still bugged because 2 of the rings don’t perfectly hook like they are supposed to. But, it looks great overall.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Farina

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Stylish but cheaply made. Comes unassembled with instructions that are incomprehensible. It was impossible to put it together so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric NJ

customer_reviews.title: I like it - only issue is it is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it - only issue is it is a bit flimsy. Kind of a hassle to put together. The smaller outside pieces are hard to get aligned so they look symmetrical. I like it once we got it put up and we can't see it up close any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is quite easy and they look great
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is quite easy and they look great. Make sure you use correct light bulbs with it. Bought for a restaurant. Love the look. Not too big or small. 24" size used.
customer_reviews.author: jmd08

customer_reviews.title: Bought the 24" and love it
customer_reviews.text: My ceilings are 8 foot and my table is 54" square, it was easy to put together and beautiful hanging.
customer_reviews.author: LaNutcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it..it fit perfectly in my master bathroom!!! I purchased the chrome one because I have chrome fixtures. It definitely put the finishing touches on my remodeled bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put together without bending...pegs that fit into holes dont line up..
customer_reviews.author: miss jean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light!
customer_reviews.text: Such a statement piece in our home. The light is large and stylish, and although it was a bit complicated to install (mostly due to its size), it is exactly what we envisioned for our formal living room. The price is extremely reasonable for the size/style...would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MBoze

customer_reviews.title: It has a really solid construction it is much bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a really solid construction it is much bigger than I thought though it seems silly how wide it is but that is more my fault for not measuring. Apart from being big it is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: Absolute hell putting this together & still does. It fit / sit correctly

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Looks okay once put together but the rings don’t meet up like they should and it’s really difficult to get the lights straight.
customer_reviews.author: ajdrigg

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I had this professionally installed so I cannot speak to the ease of installation. I do know that all the parts were included and it looks lovely in my foyer. Happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T. Link

customer_reviews.title: Eventually (after frustrating assembly) Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This light is SO pretty! If you have the patience to put it together, you’ll be glad that you did.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice, easy to assemble my wife is Happy! Looks Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: As per the other reviews the light is amazing, purring it together was a little tricky but ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my light and put it together. As per the other reviews the light is amazing, putting it together was a little tricky but the material is nice and light. I haven't moved in to my new home yet so I have yet to hang it up but I'm sure it will look fantastic above my kitchen table .
customer_reviews.author: Christy Breeden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture completes the look in my bedroom and was easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light 💙
customer_reviews.text: Love it / it looks great ! And what a great price :) When putting it together put it inside the cardboard to stand it up. ( see photo )
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Magliarditi

customer_reviews.title: It’s enhances the look of my home!
customer_reviews.text: I placed it in the foyer of my home as I am changing all of my out dated lighting. We are all thoroughly pleased with our new look. This accessory makes not being able to get an entirely new house much easier and quite acceptable!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: i was skeptical about it but it turned out to be beautiful! only complaint would be that the instructions on assembly arent very easy to read.

customer_reviews.title: I love this fixture
customer_reviews.text: Though this was a bit of a challenge to put together....LOL! I love this fixture. It has truly changed the appearance of my master bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bronze orb chandelier! The bronze matches the decor in our house and the smaller size of the orb looks great above our dining table. I would definitely recommend this chandelier!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my entry way. Matched the light got we got over our table. Very happy!!

customer_reviews.title: Good value

customer_reviews.title: Orb light

customer_reviews.title: Out of the ordinary
customer_reviews.text: I chose this Dining light for its modern styling, it offered a very different look as opposed to something ordinary! Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Great chandelier for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! And pretty easy to put together. The only thing I suggest is to provide a tool or someway to open the chain links in order to connect them to the appropriate pieces. The bronze coating got pretty scratched up when my husband had to open them and close them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product great company!
customer_reviews.text: Great light! We bought one for over our kitchen table- beautiful! Now purchased a second for our new home! Can’t beat the price. Highly recommend!!

product_meta.title: Kira Home Orbits II 15" 4-Light Modern Rustic Armillary Sphere/Orb Chandelier, Oil-Rubbed Bronze Finish
feature_bullets: MODERN, INDUSTRIAL STYLE: Bright, globe shaped cage chandelier features a stunning oil-rubbed bronze finish with 5 intertwining rings surrounding a 4-light candelabra set in the center. This piece is unique, well crafted and durable. ASSEMBLY IS REQUIRED

ELEVATE YOUR SPACE: Hang this standout piece in many areas & decors. A perfect chandelier for entryways & foyers with high ceilings, above a large kitchen island or dining room table. Place over a desk in the office. Dimmer & sloped ceiling compatible
UL LISTED FOR YOUR SAFETY: UL listed for dry locations. Uses (4) LED, CFL, or up to 60W incandescent Type B candelabra base bulbs. Bulbs sold separately
DIMENSIONS: Dining Room Light: 15.25" (D) x 18" (H), Canopy: 5" (D) x 1" (H). Includes 72" of chain for desired hanging height. Adjustable hanging height 23"- 93"

UNMATCHED QUALITY AND CUSTOMER CARE: Designed and supported in California. Quality, innovation, and attractive products are our motto. We provide a 1-year warranty when purchased from an authorized dealer. Shop with confidence!
